alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 11:16AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern San Diego County through NOON PST... At 1116 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over College West, or over North Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chula Vista, El Cajon, National City, La Mesa, Poway, Imperial Beach, Ramona, Coronado, Del Mar, Mission Valley, Hillcrest, Linda Vista, North Park, Mission Beach, Midway District Including Lindbergh Field, Tierrasanta, University City, La Jolla, Point Loma, and Downtown San Diego. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys
